title: Contrastive Phonetics and Phonology Blended Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic phonetics and phonology theories, and comparative language analysis methods
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to administer project-based assessments in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the phonological systems of 20 minimal pairs using contrastive phonetics theory
Learners can compare more than 10 sets of actual language data using digital voice analysis tools
Learners can design and execute collaborative learning projects in a blended learning environment and submit a final report (over 5,000 characters)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
